Title: Out of the Easy
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Beau DeMayo, Michelle Paradise, Declan De Barra (executive story editor), Ashley Lyle (executive story editor), Bart Nickerson (executive story editor), Michael Russo (executive story editor), Carina Adly MacKenzie (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Klaus and Elijah plan a Thanksgiving gathering in hopes of negotiating a truce; Vincent and Marcel realize Davina might be in over her head; Cami encounters a new threat.
